name: Instant Ramen
description:
You are a bowl of ramen...

Some may think you have it easy, but what they don't understand is that you don't want to just be delicious; you want to be strong!

Fight your way through multiple levels to get the highest quality ingredients known to mankind!

Instructions:

WASD / SPACE - To Move

LEFT-CLICK - To Shoot Chopsticks

RIGH- CLICK - To Grapple
